Confidence-Pro.text: The COVID-19 vaccines are safe and efficient

Confidence-Con.text: The COVID-19 vaccine is dangerous and inefficient

Conspiracy-Pro.text: The COVID-19 vaccines are a conspiracy

Conspiracy-Con.text: The COVID-19 vaccines are not a conspiracy

Compliance-Pro.text: The COVID-19 vaccines should be required

Compliance-Con.text: The COVID-19 vaccines should be optional

Calculation-Pro.text: The COVID-19 vaccines are better than other options

Calculation-Con.text: Other options are better than the COVID-19 vaccines

Collective Responsibility-Pro.text: We are all responsible for getting the COVID-19 vaccines

Collective Responsibility-Con.text: Getting the COVID-19 vaccine is a personal choice

Complacency-Pro.text: The COVID-19 vaccines are necessary to fight COVID-19

Constraints-Pro.text: It is easy to get the COVID-19 vaccines

Constraints-Con.text: It is hard to get the COVID-19 vaccines
